packageMeta.name: purescript-argonaut-generic
packageMeta.description: Encoding and decoding functions for generic datatypes

declarations.comments: Decode `Json` representation of a value which has a `Generic` type.
declarations.title: genericDecodeJson

declarations.comments:
Decode `Json` representation of a value which has a `Generic` type.
Takes a record for encoding settings.
declarations.title: genericDecodeJsonWith

declarations.comments: A function for decoding `Generic` sum types using string literal representations.
declarations.title: decodeLiteralSum

declarations.comments:
A function for decoding `Generic` sum types using string literal representations.
Takes a function for transforming the tag name in encoding.
declarations.title: decodeLiteralSumWithTransform

declarations.comments:
Encode any `Generic` data structure into `Json`.
Takes a record for encoding settings.
declarations.title: genericEncodeJsonWith

declarations.comments: A function for encoding `Generic` sum types using string literal representations.
declarations.title: encodeLiteralSum

declarations.comments:
A function for encoding `Generic` sum types using string literal representations.
Takes a function for transforming the tag name in encoding.
declarations.title: encodeLiteralSumWithTransform

declarations.comments:
Encoding settings:
tagKey -- which key to use in the JSON object for sum-type constructors
valuesKey -- which key to use in the JSON object for sum-type values
unwrapSingleArguments -- should single-arguments constructors' values be wrapped in an array
declarations.title: Encoding
